on reading compounds: 龕【ガン】niche or alcove for an image, (in Okinawa) portable shrine used to move a deceased from their house to the graveyard
龕像【ガンゾウ】Buddha figure carved into a rock, Buddha figure in a cabinet
起龕【キガン】ceremonial removal of the coffin from the house (lay person) or temple (priest) (Zen Buddhism)
壁龕【ヘキガン】niche (in Western architecture)
